name: Average Class Hero
description:
Player is an average student in an average school that, as usual, is in love with a girl of his class. Today... as often...  he got late, but got lucky enough to sit next to her. As she never notice him, he begin to wonder in his imagination about being a super-hero, would she notice him then? Should him keep dreaming or get down to earth and work for it? Well... both! 

Get more popularity as you talk to your collegues and get better grades by not beign caught by the teacher at the same time you try to protect your school from weird,..hairy.. skeletons in your super-hero dreams.

Thank you for the people that made this game possible by sharing their art on sketchfab and allowing for it to be used. I have chosen to use those, mostly to save time having to model the faces and texturing. I still had to spend one full day in searching, cleaning and rigging those.
